properties.description: The title is a required field.
properties.title: Title of the Dataset/Study

properties.description: Author or Authors (use the button at right to add more). Please follow the convention "Lastname, Given Names."
properties.title: Author(s)/Creator(s)

properties.description: People/Organizations who aren't considered authors, but still contributed to the work. Please follow the same convention.
The date on which the data or other research object was created or published. This is a required field.
properties.title: Production Date

properties.description: Select a copyright license. Note that this does not directly affect embargo or permissions to view your research, which can be changed later. While you always retain ownership of any content deposited into UPEI's data.upei.ca Repository, by selecting a license for your content you hereby grant stewardship of the content to the Robertson Library, UPEI under terms which can be viewed from here.

options.index: Creative Commons Zero -- waive all rights and place work in public domain.
Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 -- allows free use with attribution.
Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY) -- allows others to make derivative works.
Do not apply a Creative Commons license; deposited object remains proprietary

properties.title: Copyright/License of the Dataset

properties.description: Describes the geographic coverage of the data documented.
properties.title: Geographic Coverage Description

properties.description: The dates when the data was collected.
properties.title: Time Period Covered

properties.description: Start of a date range. If there is a start date with no end date provided, this implies that the end date is unknown but that the date being recorded is not just a simple date but a range of unknown duration.
properties.title: Start Date

properties.description: Type of data included in the file, in plain language (e.g. survey data, aggregate data, GIS data). This is an autocomplete field ... just start typing to see term options.
properties.title: Data Type

properties.description:
Public - Public users can access description and download/view the dataset - a DOI is created.
Embargoed - Public users can access the description, but need to contact researcher for dataset view/download - a DOI is created.
Archive -  Only Researcher/Admin can view/access - no DOI created.

options.index: Select an Access Level for your dataset.

properties.title: Access Level
